subject: [Radiance-general] glazing modelling
body:
Hi Marija,


Make sure you have a final end-of-line character in your file.  A lot
of editors don't bother with it, but most Unix utiliities require a
final EOL (linefeed).  I checked the script, and I think this is the
most likely problem.

Regarding more than two layers, the math gets exponentially more
complicated with each layer, so I'm not likely to  add capability in
this area any time soon....

-Greg
